name: ux-library
author: UX Team, Jérémie Le Scoëzec <jeremie@agence-polux.fr> and Marc Foletto

scripts.storybook:cmb: npm run analyze:cmb && uxEfs=cmb start-storybook --port 7001 -c src/apps/cmb/.storybook
scripts.build:storybook:cmb: npm run analyze:cmb && uxEfs=cmb build-storybook -c src/apps/cmb/.storybook -o dist/cmb/storybook
scripts.build:cmb: uxEfs=cmb npm run build:lib:cmb && npm run build:storybook:cmb
scripts.test:cmb: uxEfs=cmb npm run build:lib:cmb && wct test/cmb/index.html -p --webserver-port 7003
scripts.build:lib:legacy:cmb: BROWSERSLIST_ENV=legacy uxEfs=cmb webpack -p --env.mode production --env.presets optimize --env.broswers legacy
scripts.build:lib:modern:cmb: BROWSERSLIST_ENV=modern uxEfs=cmb webpack -p --env.mode production --env.presets optimize --env.broswers modern
scripts.build:lib:two:cmb: uxEfs=cmb npm run build:lib:legacy:cmb && npm run build:lib:modern:cmb
scripts.build:cmbnew: uxEfs=cmbnew npm run build:lib:cmbnew && npm run build:storybook:cmbnew
scripts.storybook:cmbnew: npm run analyze:cmbnew && uxEfs=cmbnew start-storybook --port 7001 -c src/apps/cmbnew/.storybook
scripts.build:storybook:cmbnew: npm run analyze:cmbnew && uxEfs=cmbnew build-storybook -c src/apps/cmbnew/.storybook -o dist/cmbnew/storybook

scripts.test:cmso: uxEfs=cmso npm run build:lib:cmso && wct test/cmso/index.html -p --webserver-port 7203
